title: After-dinner Mint for 2.54: A Pagan visits Paul's Club in Thessalonica
itunes:title: After-dinner Mint: A Pagan visits a Jesus Club
description: This is an addendum to episode 2.54, Paul's Second Mission: To The Greeks. It is a repeat of part of an earlier episode. I imagine a curious pagan's reaction to hearing Paul's first letter to the Thessalonians.
content:encoded: This is an addendum to episode 2.54, Paul's Second Mission: To The Greeks. It is a repeat of part of an earlier episode. I imagine a curious pagan's reaction to hearing Paul's first letter to the Thessalonians.
itunes:subtitle: I imagine a curious pagan's reaction to hearing Paul's first letter to the Thessalonians.
itunes:author: Garry Stevens
